mentionedBy.name: Workday Inc.
mentionedBy.notes: Cloud-based HCM for mid-sized to large organizations offering end-to-end workforce management. Comprehensive payroll processing, employee record management, compliance tracking, scheduling, recruiting, onboarding, and performance management
